quotes.quote: The most regular and most perfect soul in the world has but too much to do to keep itself upright from being overthrown by its own weakness.
When you work regularly, inspiration strikes regularly.
MindlessÂ habitualÂ behavior is the enemy of innovation.
Criminals are just regular people who didn't have time to read all the laws.
OurÂ habitualÂ experience is a complex of failure and success in the enterprise of interpretation. If we desire a record of uninterpreted experience, we must ask a stone to record its autobiography.
It is theÂ habitual, not the periodical thought that decides your destiny.
Whatever is difficult can be done with regular attention and actions. Stay focused.
Regular people laugh harder. Industry people are stuffy, very judgmental.
Regular feedback is one of the hardest things to drive through an organization.
In the midst of regular life, running is the touchstone that breathes adventure into my soul.
The man of regular life and rational mind never despairs.
Regular chiropractic adjustments go hand in hand with good health.
Whatever you would makeÂ habitual, practice it; and if you would not make a thingÂ habitual, do not practice it, but accustom yourself to something else.
Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
When a regular person gets sick, they take an aspirin. When a writer gets sick, they take notes.
Regular people are used to rudeness; we get it all the time, we're inured to it. The wealthy aren't; it hurts their feelings, or whatever they have in there.
Take the regular wagon track and never leave it.
Regular people should not underestimate people who are small. In every aspect, they can do the things that normal people can.
Things we doÂ regularly become buried with habits, and we lose the ability to extract their powers to inspire.
Regular and simple life is the life of God; the chaotic and the complex one is the Devil's!
Do you pay regular visits to yourself? Start now.
